body_html:
@peterjc123

Hi , hope you are doing good.

I am using anaconda on windows 7 64 bits and created a virtual_platform and used the command:
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch_legacy cuda80

to test in python i open spyder and enter import torch i receive above mentioned error

from torch._C import *
ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified module could not be found

in my system i have installed python 3.6.
in anaconda it is python 3.6.3
and when i activate virtual_platform in anaconda , python version is 3.5.4

so after reading above i downloaded dependency walker

and root it to the path you have mentioned. Please see the image and provide your input that what should i do?

can you help me?
can you guys share your experience with me on this also?@mctvis , @Dtiffster ? that a correct path that will help everyone who will face this problem?

can you guys help me that how to install pytorch ?

body:
@peterjc123 

Hi , hope you are doing good. 

I am using anaconda on windows 7 64 bits and created a virtual_platform and used the command:
conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch_legacy cuda80

to test in python i open spyder and enter import torch i receive above mentioned error

from torch._C import *
ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified module could not be found
 
in my system i have installed python 3.6.
in anaconda it is python 3.6.3
and when i activate virtual_platform in anaconda , python version is 3.5.4

so after reading above i downloaded dependency walker

and root it to the path you have mentioned. Please see the image and provide your input that what should i do?

![dependency](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/34816200/34328305-41b58ad6-e902-11e7-9734-1111335e4f0c.png)

can you help me?
can you guys share your experience with me on this also?@mctvis , @Dtiffster ? that a correct path that will help everyone who will face this problem?

can you guys help me that how to install pytorch ?
